mapper.sql: create_by, del_flag, gmt_create, gmt_modified, id, modified_by, remarks, tenant_id, title, type, version
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_resource_type ( create_by, del_flag, gmt_create, gmt_modified, modified_by, remarks, tenant_id, title, type, version ) values( #{createBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{gmtCreate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version, jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_resource_type set create_by = #{createBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag, jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_by = #{modifiedBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tenant_id = #{tenantId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, title = #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version, jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
